# Multi-connection downloads with aria2

Scoop can utilize aria2 (opens new window) to use multi-connection downloads. Simply install aria2 through Scoop and it will be used for all downloads afterward.

scoop install aria2

You can tweak the following aria2 settings with the scoop config command:

  • aria2-enabled (default: true)
  • aria2-retry-wait (opens new window) (default: 2)
  • aria2-split (opens new window) (default: 5)
  • aria2-max-connection-per-server (opens new window) (default: 5)
  • aria2-min-split-size (opens new window) (default: 5M)
